name: EvosimTVE
description:
This Project was made for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019 with the Theme "DNA Chaos"

EvosimTVE is a 2D Evolution Simulator based on natural selection.
Spawn Creatures and Food and see how they evolve over the generations.
It will get frequent updates after the Jam.Controlls:Move Camera: W,A,S,DChange Simulation Speed: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7
